title: An Act relative to the training, certification, and recognition of constables and civil deputy sheriffs

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Collins, a petition (accompanied by bill) (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Nick Collins for legislation relative to the training, certification, and recognition of constables and civil deputy sheriffs.  Public Safety and Homeland Security.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security

related_entities.name: committee on Public Safety and Homeland Security
